original_title: ปอบหน้าปลวก
overview: After the gang of four girls students in front of the ugly Miki, Ploy, Kaew and Khao millet come to train at a wooden furniture factory with Tui Tui, a young factory manager to take care of and take the role of the leader of the ugly gang.
tagline: In this era is there still some hungry ugly ghost?
title: The Ugly Ghost
